title: Spotify Stations app is shutting down on May 16
content:
A few years ago Spotify opened up a second app that offered an experience based around “radio” stations. Now, Spotify Stations is shutting down later this month.

more…

The post Spotify Stations app is shutting down on May 16 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After nearly four years, Spotify Stations will be shutting down its mobile and web apps on May 16, 2022 for all users.
